name: pelican-panel
description: Panel is a lightweight self-hosted dashboard designed to group links, services, and widgets into a single portal. Itâ€™s ideal for server admins and homelab setups.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Centralize access to all your services and applications through single, organized dashboard interface

features.title: Custom Categories
features.description: Organize links and services into logical groups or categories for easier navigation and management

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage makes it ideal for running on low-power devices or alongside other services

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Mobile-optimized interface adapts to any screen size for access from desktops, tablets, or smartphones

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Quickly find services or links using integrated search without scrolling through categories

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Personalize appearance with custom themes, colors, and layouts to match your preferences
